word:
Chap. 13 - Evils Resulting from Centralization and Colonization

INTRODUCTION 

     IN THIS SECTION THE READER WILL FIND SELECT STATEMENTS DEALING WITH FIVE IMPORTANT ASPECTS OF THE CHURCH AND ITS PUBLISHING WORK: 1. CENTRALIZATION, 2. COLONIZATION, 3. CONFEDERACY, 4. CONSOLIDATION, AND 5. COOPERATION.
